title: RESCUE EFFORTS
paras: At Batla house demolition site 50-60 ppl sleeping cluttered in 1 shanty in a small sleeping area. No aid from government has reached to rehabilitate/stop demolition of remaining jhuggis.We distributed food  and water  with help of MCKS organization ,Locals & gave water. Food & water is arranged till any permanent solution by government. Our team has also arranged mosquito nets for family staying on demolished areas.
At Faridabad Demolition site our team contributed Rations for community kitchen started by locals for family affected by this Demolition.
